column4: Hi, can someone give me some mail server advice. I have postfix/dovecot and SpamAssassin running on my Ubuntu server. Is there a way to automatically filter all messages flagged as Spam into an IMAP folder? Thanks for any help you guys can provide..
I am not sure if my Ubuntu server is set up to *automatically* filter and I'm missing the folder, or what.
this is usually done with either procmail or sieve
for the later there is a dovecot sieve plugin
